answers.answer: Red bumps could be hives and could be an allergic reaction.You would need to see your Dr. about this.Is this just new?  How long have  you been taking langus?

question: I have type 2 diabetes and I have red bumps al over my body im not sure if this can be allergic reaction to the med im taking (lantus)
title: need to know if the med im taking is causeing my rash all over my body
